Test Name: Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Enzyme Analysis (ETC) in Skin Fibroblasts
Purpose: To quantify activities of mitochondrial respiratory chain enzymes (Complexes I–IV) in cultured fibroblasts for diagnostic evaluation of mitochondrial disorders.
Container: Sterile cell-culture flask or cryovial for harvested cell pellets
Equipment: Refrigerated centrifuge; spectrophotometer; 37 °C water bath; -80 °C freezer or liquid nitrogen; homogenizer; CO2 incubator; laminar flow hood; protein assay kit
